document_data.name: Company of the Crushed Grapes
document_data.mainbody: The '''Company of the Crushed Grapes''' was a mercenary company stationed in [[Nimpeth]], the [[Free Cities of the Vilhon Reach]], ''circa'' [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Company of the Crushed Grapes was under the leadership of [[Duke Folkwain]], who was a member of the group and was put in charge of all mercenaries hired by the city of Nimpeth. The Crushed Grapes were a special force that served Nimpeth's leader, Lord [[Woren]], through his second in command, Duke Folkwain. In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the company consisted of more than 250 foot soldiers and 150 [[horse]]back riders.
